thread.title: Spacious! Vanity area for the ladies!
thread.title_full: Spacious! Vanity area for the ladies! - Review of The Tuscany - A St Giles Signature Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pamelabB7850XP
title: Spacious! Vanity area for the ladies!
text: Spacious room with separate vanity area and walk in closet. Loved having this private space when getting ready! The front desk brought up a little fridge at our request, it felt like staying in our own little apartment instead of a hotel. Nice big comfy bed and loved the walk in shower. Just around the corner from Grand Central, excellent location in midtown. Will stay here again next time in NYC.
